name: Betterfly (larissastorck)
description:
Game developed in ~ 3 days for the 3rd edition of Women Game Jam.

Theme: Independence & Identity

Developed in Unity for the Android platform.

A 2D climber portraying the metamorphosis of a caterpillar that feels inferior to the others butterflies, but as it collects the pieces of its broken heart and accepts its identity, can finally evolve into a beautiful butterfly and gain independence by flying away from others.

Controls: move character left and right through accelerometer

Team:
Daniela Reigas (Dani Kiedis) - game design - https://danikiedis.itch.io/
Laís Rodrigues - Art https://www.artstation.com/marim
Larissa Storck - Programming
